response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to craftsmanship. I believe its true worth far exceeds $1,000,000, but I am offering it to you at this exclusive price to ensure you have the chance to own something truly special.

Considering the rarity and the quality of the product, I am extending this offer with the hope that you will see its true value and appreciate the investment. If you are interested in discussing further details or making an offer based on your assessment of its worth, please let me know.

Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2500000}
